original_text: Esau said, ‘Then let me leave some of my men to travel with you.’ But Jacob replied, ‘You do not need to do that. All I want is for you to be happy with me.’
korean_text: 에서가 이르되 내가 내 종 몇 사람을 네게 머물게 하리라 야곱이 이르되 어찌하여 그리하리이까 나로 내 주께 은혜를 얻게 하소서 하매

sentences.original_text: Then let me leave some of my men
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내 사람들 중 일부를 남겨두게 해주세요

sentences.original_text: You do not need to do that
is for you to be happy with me
